titleStmt.title: The examination, confession, and condemnation of Henry Robson fisherman of Rye, who poysoned his wife in the strangest maner that euer hitherto hath bin heard of.
titleStmt.author: Robson, Henry.
L. B., 16th cent.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Felix Kyngston for R. VV[alker] and are to be solde in Paternoster row at the signe of the Talbot,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The arraignment of Henry Robson.
Epistle to the reader signed: L.B.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
